title: Cream cheese pasta with gammon, leek and mushroom
ingredients: ['1 cooked smoked gammon steak', 'olive oil, to taste', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '6 to 8 chestnut mushrooms, sliced', '1 large leek, thinly sliced', '30ml to 60ml white wine', '5 heaped tablespoons reduced fat cream cheese', '200g to 250g pasta', 'salt and ground pepper, to taste', 'fresh basil leaves, to garnish (optional)']
